verses.verse: Every wise <WH2454> woman <WH802> builds <WH1129> her house <WH1004>: but the foolish <WH200> plucks it down <WH2040> with her hands <WH3027>.
He that walks <WH1980> in his uprightness <WH3476> fears <WH3373> the Lord <WH3068>: but he that is perverse <WH3868> in his ways <WH1870> despises him <WH959>.
In the mouth <WH6310> of the foolish <WH191> is a rod <WH2415> of pride <WH1346>: but the lips <WH8193> of the wise <WH2450> shall preserve them <WH8104>.
Where no oxen <WH504> are <WH18>, the crib is clean <WH1249>: but much <WH7230> increase <WH8393> is by the strength <WH3581> of the ox <WH7794>.
A faithful <WH529> witness <WH5707> will not lie <WH3577>: but a false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> will utter <WH6315> lies <WH3576>.
A scorner <WH3887> seeks <WH1245> wisdom <WH2451>, and finds it not <WH1847>: but knowledge is easy <WH7043> unto him that understands <WH995>.
Go <WH3212> from the presence <WH5048> of a foolish <WH3684> man <WH376>, when you perceive <WH3045> not in him the lips <WH8193> of knowledge <WH1847>.
The wisdom <WH2451> of the prudent <WH6175> is to understand <WH995> his way <WH1870>: but the wickedness <WH200> of fools <WH3684> is deceit <WH4820>.
Fools <WH191> make a mock <WH3887> at sin <WH817>: but among the righteous <WH3477> there is favor <WH7522>.
The heart <WH3820> knows <WH3045> his own <WH5315> bitterness <WH4787>; and a stranger <WH2114> does not share <WH6148> with his joy <WH8057>.
The house <WH1004> of the wicked <WH7563> shall be overthrown <WH8045>: but the tabernacle <WH168> of the upright <WH3477> shall flourish <WH6524>.
There is <WH3426> a way <WH1870> which seems right <WH3477> unto <WH6440> a man <WH376>, but the end <WH319> there are the ways <WH1870> of death <WH4194>.
Even in laughter <WH7814> the heart <WH3820> is sorrowful <WH3510>; and the end <WH319> of that mirth <WH8057> is heaviness <WH8424>.
The backslider <WH5472> in heart <WH3820> shall be filled <WH7646> with his own ways <WH1870>: and a good <WH2896> man shall be satisfied from himself <WH376>.
The simple <WH6612> believes <WH539> every word <WH1697>: but the prudent <WH6175> man looks wisely <WH995> to his ways <WH838>.
A wise <WH2450> man fears <WH3373>, and departs <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>: but the fool <WH3684> rages <WH5674>, and is confident <WH982>.
He that is soon <WH7116> angry <WH639> deals <WH6213> foolishly <WH200>: and a man <WH376> of wicked devices <WH4209> is hated <WH8130>.
The simple <WH6612> inherit <WH5157> wickedness <WH200>: but the prudent <WH6175> are crowned <WH3803> with knowledge <WH1847>.
The evil <WH7451> bow <WH7817> before <WH6440> the good <WH2896>; and the wicked <WH7563> at the gates <WH8179> of the righteous <WH6662>.
The poor <WH7326> is hated <WH8130> even of his own neighbor <WH7453>: but the rich <WH6223> has many <WH7227> friends <WH157>.
He that despises <WH936> his neighbor <WH7453> sins <WH2398>: but he that has mercy <WH2603> on the poor <WH6035>, happy is he <WH835>.
Do they not err <WH8582> that devise <WH2790> evil <WH7451>? but mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> shall be to them that devise <WH2790> good <WH2896>.
In all labor <WH6089> there is profit <WH4195>: but the talk <WH1697> of the lips <WH8193> tends only to poverty <WH4270>.
The crown <WH5850> of the wise <WH2450> is their riches <WH6239>: but the foolishness <WH200> of fools <WH3684> is wickedness <WH200>.
A true <WH571> witness <WH5707> delivers <WH5337> souls <WH5315>: but a deceitful <WH4820> witness speaks <WH6315> lies <WH3577>.
In the fear <WH3374> of the Lord <WH3068> is strong <WH5797> confidence <WH4009>: and his sons <WH1121> shall have a place of refuge <WH4268>.
The fear <WH3374> of the Lord <WH3068> is a fountain <WH4726> of life <WH2416>, to depart <WH5493> from the snares <WH4170> of death <WH4194>.
In the multitude <WH7230> of people <WH5971> is the king <WH4428>'s honor <WH1927>: but in the want <WH657> of people <WH3816> is the destruction <WH4288> of the prince <WH7333>.
He that is slow <WH750> to wrath <WH639> is of great <WH7227> understanding <WH8394>: but he that is hasty <WH7116> of spirit <WH7307> exalts <WH7311> wickedness <WH200>.
A sound <WH4832> heart <WH3820> is the life <WH2416> of the flesh <WH1320>: but envy <WH7068> the rottenness <WH7538> of the bones <WH6106>.
He that oppresses <WH6231> the poor <WH1800> blasphemes <WH2778> his Maker <WH6213>: but he that honors <WH3513> him has mercy <WH2603> on the poor <WH34>.
The wicked <WH7563> is driven away <WH1760> in his wickedness <WH7451>: but the righteous <WH6662> has hope <WH2620> in his death <WH4194>.
Wisdom <WH2451> rests <WH5117> in the heart <WH3820> of him that has understanding <WH995>: but that which is in the middle <WH7130> of fools <WH3684> is made known <WH3045>.
Righteousness <WH6666> exalts <WH7311> a nation <WH1471>: but sin <WH2403> is a reproach <WH2617> to any people <WH3816>.
The king <WH4428>'s favor <WH7522> is toward a wise <WH7919> servant <WH5650>: but his wrath <WH5678> is against him that causes shame <WH954>.
